item.title: Tropical Storm ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 5
item.description:
Issued at 0900Z SUN SEP 07 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
TROPICAL STORM ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   5
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
0900Z SUN SEP 07 2003
 
TROPICAL STORM CENTER LOCATED NEAR 13.7N  37.1W AT 07/0900Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST OR 275 DEGREES AT   9 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  994 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  55 KT WITH GUSTS TO  65 KT.
50 KT....... 25NE  25SE  25SW  25NW.
34 KT....... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
12 FT SEAS..100NE 100SE 100SW 100NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 13.7N  37.1W AT 07/0900Z
AT 07/0600Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 13.6N  36.6W
 
FORECAST VALID 07/1800Z 13.8N  38.5W
MAX WIND  60 KT...GUSTS  75 KT.
50 KT... 25NE  25SE  25SW  25NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 08/0600Z 14.8N  40.9W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
64 KT... 20NE  20SE  20SW  20NW.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 08/1800Z 15.6N  43.2W
MAX WIND  70 KT...GUSTS  85 KT.
64 KT... 20NE  20SE  20SW  20NW.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 09/0600Z 16.5N  45.3W
MAX WIND  75 KT...GUSTS  90 KT.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 10/0600Z 18.0N  50.0W
MAX WIND  85 KT...GUSTS 105 KT.
50 KT... 35NE  35SE  35SW  35NW.
34 KT... 90NE  90SE  90SW  90NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 11/0600Z 18.5N  55.5W
MAX WIND  85 KT...GUSTS 105 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 12/0600Z 19.0N  60.0W
MAX WIND  85 KT...GUSTS 105 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 13.7N  37.1W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 07/1500Z
 
FORECASTER MOLLEDA/LAWRENCE
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
